dangerous_goods.environmental_hazard: May cause pollution to aquatic life
dangerous_goods.stowage: Separate from foodstuffs and other edibles.
dangerous_goods.handling: Handle with care, wear appropriate personal protective equipment.
dangerous_goods.emergency_procedures: In case of spillage, isolate area, contain spill, and neutralize with appropriate absorbent material. Seek immediate medical attention if exposed.
dangerous_goods.additional_information: This shipment must comply with all applicable regulations for the transportation of dangerous goods.
